casebody.data:
THAMES RIVER LINE, Owner of THE Steamer CARISCO, Libelant-Appellee, v. CHESTER A. POLING, Inc., Motor Vessel THE POLING BROS. NO. 6, Claimant-Appellant. CHESTER A. POLING, Inc., Owner of THE POLING BROS. NO. 6, Libelant-Appellant, v. THAMES RIVER LINE, Owner of THE Steamer CARISCO, Claimant-Appellee. No. 31. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 15, 1934. Alexander, Ash So Jones, of New York City, for appellant. Purdy & Purdy, of Now York City (John E. Purdy, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Deerees (6 F. Supp. 743) affirmed.
